participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, Emily loves to engage with new people and share her interests. She's open-minded and curious about the world around her.
participant_1.background: I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton. I can do convincing bird calls. I graduated college for secondary English education. My favorite activity is fishing. I live with my husband and two children.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Creative and hardworking, Michael is passionate about cooking and music. He has a nurturing side and seeks to provide joy through the meals he prepares.
participant_2.background: I love the feeling of a job well done, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people. I decided to write my own songs to challenge myself and to pursue my passion for music. My favorite band is the Beatles. I work hard and save money for my future. I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.

content.text: Hey! I'm a new teacher, and I'm looking to meet some new people. What do you do for fun?
I love to cook, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people. I also love to write music and play guitar.
That's awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not as good as you! I wish I could play the guitar.
You should learn! It's really fun. And you can play all your favorite songs!
Yeah, I've always wanted to learn. Maybe I'll take some lessons.
That's a great idea!
What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is the Beatles. I love their music.
Oh, I love the Beatles too! They're my favorite band too!
That's awesome! What's your favorite song by them?
I love so many of their songs, but I think my favorite is "All You Need Is Love."
That's a great song! I love the message of that song.
Yeah, it's a beautiful song.
What's your favorite color?
My favorite color is green.
That's a great color! I love the color green too. It's so calming and peaceful.
Yeah, it's perfect for relaxing.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing, hiking, and camping. I also like to play video games.
That sounds fun! I like to go hiking and camping too. I've never been fishing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's really fun.
Yeah, I'll have to try it sometime.
Yeah, you should!
